record.name: Lotus Notes Account
record.description: A Lotus Notes Account enables you to access many feature rich applications designed for the Lotus Notes platform. This includes Lotus Notes E-mail for your messaging needs as well as providing workflow and messaging functionality for Lotus Notes/Domino applications. A Lotus Notes License is required to access Lotus Notes applications, e-mail, and fax services. The license is for the legal use of the Lotus Notes Client Software. No license is required for accessing Lotus Domino applications via the web.
record.detailedDescription: A Lotus Notes Account enables you to access many feature rich applications designed for the Lotus Notes platform. This includes Lotus Notes E-mail for your messaging needs as well as providing workflow and messaging functionality for Lotus Notes/Domino applications. A Lotus Notes License is required to access Lotus Notes applications, e-mail, and fax services. The license is for the legal use of the Lotus Notes Client Software. No license is required for accessing Lotus Domino applications via the web.
